title: Elbow Grease All Purpose Paste Bathroom Kitchen Cleaner Lemon Fresh Scent 500G
features: ELBOW GREASE ALL-PURPOSE PASTE: Keep your home sparkling clean with this All-Purpose Paste, the miracle product from Elbow Grease with thousands of positive reviews and happy customers worldwide
TOUGH ON STAINS: This powerful cleaning paste is ideal for removing tough and stubborn stains from household surfaces. Perfect for use in the bathroom, kitchen, and even outdoors

VERSATILE PRODUCT: This miracle All Purpose Paste can be used on a wide range of surfaces such as kitchen and bathroom sinks, cooker tops, baking trays, barbecues, grills, ovens, tiles, furniture and many more. It removes the toughest of stains, dirt, discolouration and rust from ceramic, wood and metal surfaces
FRESH LEMON SCENT: The paste is yellow and is lightly scented with a fresh, citrus fragrance. It leaves a lovely lemon scent in your kitchen and bathroom that lasts for hours
ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Size - 500g. Apply using a clean, soft cloth or sponge. Do not use on plastic, acrylic, highly polished surfaces, aluminium or car paint surfaces. Mild abrasive - use with care
description: Product Description Keep your home sparkling clean with this All Purpose Paste, the miracle product from Elbow Grease. This powerful cleaning paste is ideal for removing tough and stubborn stains from the surfaces such as kitchen and bathroom sinks, cooker tops, baking trays, barbecues, grills, ovens, tiles, furniture and more. It quickly and efficiently removes the toughest of stains, dirt, discolouration and rust from ceramic, wood and metal surfaces. Lemon fresh scent. Pack size - Size - 500g. Ingredients Contains amongst other ingredients: 5% - 15% Soap, <5% Non-Ionic surfactants. Also contains Limonene, Methylisothiazolinone, Benzisothiazolinone.
